main event: A celestial phenomenon was sighted over the eastern horizon while at anchor in the Mississippi River near Donaldsonville, Louisiana on 17 October 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared in a brilliant circular glow,It descended to approximately 3000 feet,The sighting reported huge vapor trails left by the object,The object made a ragged circular course during its movement,Visibility was reported as 5 miles with cloud banks present.
witness description: sighted while at anchor in Mississippi River
